messages.title: Why does this election matter?
messages.content: Three reasons why you shouldn't waste your vote

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour have left a massive debt legacy. The SNP have let us down on jobs. It's important we have a local voice for our community.
The focus on education and keeping policy local.

mentions.candidate: Gordon Macdonald lives locally and will be a great voice for our community.

issues.economy: Labour have left a massive debt legacy. The SNP have let us down on jobs.
issues.education: Need to focus on education and keeping policy local.

leaflet.personalStatement: Experienced, hard working... and fighting for Strathkelvin & Bearsden

quotes.text: Gordon Macdonald lives locally and will be a great voice for our community.
